title: IVR-Based Science Concept Learning Design: Concept Map Utilization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Science learning project combining IVR (Immersive Virtual Reality) and concept mapping in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, applying advanced language domains to prepare learners for professional employment

learning_goals: Learners can explain plant science concepts with 80% or higher accuracy in an IVR (Immersive Virtual Reality) environment.
Learners can systematically structure complex scientific information using concept maps.
Learners can comprehensively evaluate IVR learning experiences in report format by forming PBL (Project-Based Learning) teams.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
